Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

plugin remove

Usage Synopsis
General $ appbuilder plugin remove <Name or ID> [--debug] [--release]

Disables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules from your project.

For Apache Cordova projects, removes the files of the specified plugin from the plugins directory.
For NativeScript projects, removes the module from the dependencies in the package.json of your project and, if needed, removes any module files from the plugins directory.

Options

  • --debug - Disables the specified plugin for the Debug build configuration only.
  • --release - Disables the specified plugin for the Release build configuration only.

Attributes

  • <Name or ID> is the name or ID of the Apache Cordova plugin or custom npm or NativeScript module as listed by $ appbuilder plugin

Related Commands

Command Description
kendoui Lists the available Kendo UI Core or Kendo UI Professional packages that you can add to your project.
kendoui install Updates or adds Kendo UI Code or Kendo UI Professional to your project.
kendoui notes Shows release notes for the available Kendo UI Core and Kendo UI Professional packages.
plugin Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that are currently enabled for your project.
plugin add Enables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project.
plugin configure Configures plugin variables for selected core, integrated or verified Apache Cordova plugins.
plugin find Searches by one or more keywords for Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules.
plugin fetch Imports the selected Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules into your project.
